attributes.action: Proclaim St George's Day (23rd April this year) as a national holiday in England by 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Northern Ireland have St Patrick's Day counted as a holiday, in addition to bank holidays.  As we have the least amount of national holidays in Europe, don't you think it's only fair?

rejection.details: This petition overlaps one already in existence - for example: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BankHolidays/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
